snippet: “Gesualdo Reflections” contrasted performances of Gesualdo’s madrigals with works by living composers that quoted, incorporated or alluded to his music.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews Antioch Chamber Ensemble performance of music by Carlo Gesualdo, presented by the Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center at Good Shepherd-Faith Presbyterian Church.
lead_paragraph: “Gesualdo Reflections” contrasted performances of Gesualdo’s madrigals with works by living composers that quoted, incorporated or alluded to his music.

headline.main: In Dense Madrigals, What You Hear Is Whatever You Can See
headline.print_headline: In Dense Madrigals, What You Hear Is Whatever You Can See

keywords.value: Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center
keywords.name: organizations
